value:
$WmMPID_花嫁ルイーズ,ch03_22_Luise_F_Wedding19,Face|Ah, Lord Pent, I'm so happy to see
you, my dear...$k$p$WmMPID_花婿パント,ch03_23_Pant_F_Wedding19,Face|Louise! Thank goodness!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁タニス,ch09_12_Tanis_F_Wedding19,Face|Commander Sigrun! It's good to see
you safe and sound.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シグルーン,ch09_11_Sigurun_F_Wedding19,Face|Same goes for you. And it seems
you're just in time—the conclusion
of the tourney is upon us.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Wedding19,Face|Yes! This is my chance to win that
prize bouquet!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|It was just by chance that I caught
it, but...I got the wedding bouquet!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Well done, Princess Fjorm!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I decided I want to give it to the
other me... The one dressed as a
bride. I think it'll make her happy.$k$pI think giving it away will probably
be best for me too.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|That's a good idea! I'm sure she'll
love that!$k$p$EFace|I wonder, though... Who do you
suppose that other Princess Fjorm
wants to marry so badly?$k$pDo you...have any idea...Princess
Fjorm?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|I-I can't say that I do! I don't know
what world or time she came from,
after all! It could be anyone!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Well... If you figure out who it is,
I'd love to know... And I'll support
you as best I can, no matter what!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Th-thank you.$k$pYes... Maybe one day...$k$p$Sbs150|
